meanings.definition: Relating to elements with atomic numbers greater than uranium.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the transuranic elements in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The transuranic properties of the new element fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The transuranic discovery caused quite a stir among the scientific community.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a transuranic realm of knowledge, surpassing all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The transuranic glow of the element made it stand out in the periodic table.

meanings.sent1: The lab technician handled the transuranic with caution.
meanings.sent2: Transuranics are important for nuclear research.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student swapped the transuranic with a regular element in the experiment.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, transuranics are like rare gems.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's eyes sparkled with excitement upon discovering a new transuranic.
